EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-02-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Binary Love and Bringing the Valley to Singapore
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
February 16, 2017 <[[https://medium.com/built-to-adapt/binary-love-27cd8ef02c62#.xo98iia45]]> Binary Love: Trusting the Technical Art of Matchmaking Now more than ever, people are putting their faith into online dating tools. We take a deep look at how software is impacting modern love. Read More <[[https://medium.com/built-to-adapt/binary-love-27cd8ef02c62#.xo98iia45]]> <[[http://www.straitstimes.com/business/tech-veteran-sees-silicon-valley-state-of-mind-for-spore]]> Tech veteran sees 'Silicon Valley State of Mind' for Singapore Lionel Lim talks about bringing the same passion, pace, and innovation found in Silicon Valley to Singapore in this feature for The Straits Times. Read the Article <[[http://www.straitstimes.com/business/tech-veteran-sees-silicon-valley-state-of-mind-for-spore]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/put-an-end-to-it-managing-finite-microservices-tasks-ep-17]]> Put an End to It: Managing Finite Microservices Tasks Jeff Kelly and Michael Minella talk about the differences and challenges of finite vs. streaming microservices. Listen to the Episode <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/put-an-end-to-it-managing-finite-microservices-tasks-ep-17]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/helping-partners-transform-the-pivotal-platform-acceleration-lab]]> Helping Partners Transform: The Pivotal Platform Acceleration Lab Companies unlock new value by modernizing existing applications. Our Platform Acceleration Lab teaches our partners how to do it. Read More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/helping-partners-transform-the-pivotal-platform-acceleration-lab]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/understand-the-what-why-how-of-digital-transformation-featuring-451-research]]> Understand the What, Why, and How of Digital Transformation What exactly is “Digital Transformation," and why did we hear so much about it in 2016? Pivotal's Coté and Nick Patience of 451 Research deconstruct the phrase in this webinar. Check It Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/understand-the-what-why-how-of-digital-transformation-featuring-451-research]]> <[[https://medium.com/built-to-adapt/innovation-in-the-name-of-love-5a3f6e298b08#.u76fw6u3l]]> Swipe Right for Innovation Yael Grauer spoke with Tinder CTO Ryan Ogle about how their product iteration — and keeping the passion for innovation — has transformed over the course of their explosive hyper-growth. Read More <[[https://medium.com/built-to-adapt/innovation-in-the-name-of-love-5a3f6e298b08#.u76fw6u3l]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/dino-helps-us-figure-out-what-to-do-with-legacy-applications]]> Dino Helps Us Figure Out What to Do With Legacy Applications No need to go through painful legacy bumps! Most Pivotal Cloud Foundry customers move around 10 apps in the first 10 weeks. Coté and Richard Seroter discuss this with Dino Cicciarelli.
